eventName: Come Catastrophes or Wakes of Vultures
storyInfo: At the very last second, Leone chooses to remain on the plate. Jessica witnesses the power plant's explosion, and after hearing the news, Woodrow decides to find Cliff alone.

attributes.content: Hold on for ten more minutes. Blacksteel's convoy will be here soon.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: That's not going to take us to the energy tower.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: I'll stay behind... Y'all go on ahead.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: How much time can you buy us?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: How much time do you need?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: At least... half an hour?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Woodrow draws his revolver from its holster and counts the bullets.
...An hour, maybe? You need time to set the explosives, too.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: More than enough.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Woodrow...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Goodbye, Woodrow.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Hurry. Right, Jessica...
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: What is it, sir?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Thanks... Thanks for bringing it all the way here.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Woodrow fixes his hat and turns around to walk down the long street. Soon, his silhouette has disappeared into the night, leaving only a farewell ringing in the air.
Until we meet again, friends.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Sir, we've finished testing the propulsion equipment. The Engineering team is double checking the connection's structural integrity now.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Sir?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: What's the ETA for our departure?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Everything should be ready by Wednesday.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Good... Very good.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: P-Pardon me, but I have something to report.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: I'll take my leave, then.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: The team stationed on the plate has requested backup. They say a gang of robbers have blown open the bank's vault door and stolen all the reserve funds inside.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: There are four of them... and they've all been identified. It's Mr. Bianchi and his friends, as well as...
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: As well as who?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: As well as Miss Brynley.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: ...Huh.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Should we send anyone, considering that you just sent away all the security personnel stationed at the bank the other day...?
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: Let's prioritize preparing to tow the plate. No need to stop the work we have on hand. But... send out anyone we have to spare.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: One more thing. Considering Miss Brynley's unique status, should we...?
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: Don't hurt her. We have to save face for the Brynleys, after all. As for Woody... I don't see us subduing him uninjured.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Forget it... Just make sure he stays alive. As for the rest, let the troops do as they see fit.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Alright, understood.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: Right, which one's carrying the cash?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Still unclear.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: No matter who it is, send Tila and have her keep a close eye.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: H-Have you heard the news? Jessica...
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: We have to do something. The order from above is that, aside from Jessica and Woodrow, the teams can deal with everyone else as they see fit. That's all it says.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: ...Franka.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Tell everyone to prepare to deploy. We got the order to hunt them down, too.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: And you're going to follow it?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: ...We can help them, or we could take them in. But either way it's a race against time.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: We need to find them before anyone else does.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Helena, Leone, this is as far as I can take you.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I'm hearing sounds of transports that aren't from main street. Blacksteel probably sent additional men after us, just as we anticipated.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Are we going through with the plan?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Yeah, I'll stay outside to lure them away.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Godspeed... Leave this last leg of the journey to us.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Phew... Okay, Jessica...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Now you can only trust yourself.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Looks like Blacksteel will be dragging the plate off to the city in the next couple days. They have only a few guys guarding the door. Bet they have everyone else working on the connection.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Perfect... Won't be too hard to deal with, then.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: How are those soldiers doing...?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Sleeping like babies. Might wake up with a sore neck though.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: We need to hurry. If we want to blow up the power plant and seal off that passage completely, we need to set up the explosives there.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Look at those car lights... the Blacksteel people must be getting close to the mine.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Helena... you should go. I can take care of this by myself.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Leone...
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Your job is more important.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: We still haven't broken through their defenses?
attributes.name: Twitchy Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Not a single car can get close to the central avenue.
attributes.name: Helpless Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: How many robbers are there out on the street?
attributes.name: Twitchy Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Just one... a Sankta.
attributes.name: Helpless Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Is the backup here yet?
attributes.name: Twitchy Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Not yet.
attributes.name: Helpless Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Let's stop the car here... Have everyone still with us bring their gear. We'll go around the road and break through from there.
attributes.name: Twitchy Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Ambush up ahead...
attributes.name: Calm Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Going by the bullet marks... That's Blacksteel etched ammo. Good news, we found our princess.
attributes.name: Rational Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: ...Give me the amplifier.
attributes.name: Calm Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Ahem... Miss Brynley. Whatever your reasons are for participating in this robbery, we won't make this hard on you as long as you cooperate and turn yourself in.
attributes.name: Calm Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: (Whispers) Draw her attention. I'll send out a drone to track her.
attributes.name: Rational Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Stay back. I'm not surrendering.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: (Whispers) The bullet came from that diner over there.
attributes.name: Rational Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: (Whispers) Let's get in position. We'll attack as soon as we're ready.
attributes.name: Rational Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Miss Brynley, you may not understand what's going to happen to you after this. You will be sent to prison, be abandoned by your friends and family, and society will look at you with disdain... Can you really bear all that?
attributes.name: Calm Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Sir... With all due respect, I've worked with everyone at Blacksteel for a long time now. I'm not the naive rich girl I used to be.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I know better than anyone what the price of this is.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: But I still have to do it...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: There are some things you just do, no matter the price.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: That guy up ahead... That him?
attributes.name: Twitchy Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Sure, he looks like a normal old man, but you see those transports flipped upside down? He did that.
attributes.name: Helpless Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Like a wandering lost soul, the figure stands still in the middle of the road, under the flickering streetlights.
Kid... Is there something you can't say to my face?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: He can hear us from this far away?
attributes.name: Helpless Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: I've lived in far noisier places than this. I only survived this long thanks to my sharp ears.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: A legendary mercenary like you must have a lot of awe-inspiring stories to tell.
attributes.name: Helpless Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: A legendary mercenary... Now that's the first time anyone's described me like that.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: There's a long corridor in Blacksteel where pictures of our founder and his war buddies are hung. I saw one with you and our boss in it. It's inconspicuous, but I noticed it.
attributes.name: Helpless Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: What a shame... My stories ain't as legendary as you think. All I've been through is war.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: That doesn't matter... Actually, I've wanted to fight the boss for quite a well, too. Still, he's the boss. I can't exactly pull a gun on him.
attributes.name: Twitchy Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: But if you and him are in the same picture, old man, I wonder what that says about your skills.
attributes.name: Twitchy Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Rotten.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: You mean so rotten you could throw a dozen of our teams for a loop and single-handedly keep us pinned down on this street?
attributes.name: Helpless Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: I mean so rotten that everyone I ever wanted to save died a miserable death right in front of me. Everything I ever wanted to protect fell before my eyes.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Those I loved chose to leave me. Those I despised, I couldn't kill with my own hands.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: I ain't no legend... I'm just an old failure of a beckbeast.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: An old beckbeast guarding the only bones that he has left.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: When he sees the old man's fingertip twitch, the mercenary keenly realizes that something terrible is about to go down.
He aims his weapon at the target as fast as he can, but a bullet pierces his shoulder first.
Ugh!
attributes.name: Twitchy Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Dammit, I can't even see what he's doing.
attributes.name: Helpless Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: So how come I'm starting to think this is getting fun?
attributes.name: Twitchy Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Stop approaching him, you madman!
attributes.name: Helpless Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Careful. Not a step closer, kid.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: ...I'm putting everything on the line for this.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: So you came in here anyway.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Miss Brynley, bullets can ricochet indoors. I don't want to hurt you.
attributes.name: Rational Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: I don't want to hurt you, either. Please take everyone with you and leave.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I'm sorry, but this is the mission handed down to us. Not everyone's a princess like you, who can do whatever she pleases.
attributes.name: Rational Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: I'm so sorry about all this...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: The girl's voice is coming from behind the booth seats. It is soft and with a hint of doubt. Just like the mercenary's first impression of hersensitive and cowardly.
He carefully inches forward with his handgun drawn and held up next to his face.
This...
attributes.name: Rational Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: There is no one sitting in the booth. Just a sniper rifle on the table. The device on the trigger ensures it can be remotely controlled.
A communication device sits beside it. The girl's voice can be heard through its speakers.
...I really am sorry.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: The target is not in the rear kitchen.
attributes.name: Calm Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Second floor is clear.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Not outside, either.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: She's not here...
attributes.name: Rational Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Hurry and withdraw immediately. This is a feint
attributes.name: Rational Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: If you know I do whatever I please... why did you expect me to act exactly how you anticipated?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: No, don't withdraw yet!
attributes.name: Calm Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: A fiery beam of light crashes into the ground outside the window.
All units! Get down
attributes.name: Calm Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Before he can finish, there is a loud explosion.
A tire crashes through the window and, still smoking and on fire, makes a few loops on the ground before falling to the glass-strewn floor.
...All blown up. Without any transports, it'll take some time for them to make it to the power plant.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: That's plenty.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Were there more of them?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Looks like I need to hurry.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: According to the plan, you'll leave through this secret passage, and I'll set off the power plant. Once this place explodes, no one will find the passage.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Leone...
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Do you have a map of the route?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: This path is connected to the underground sewer system. The passages there are complicated and twisty. Only one will lead you outside the plate.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Jessica hid some transports and supplies near the exit. Avoid military stations on the way to the frontier... There's bound to be plenty of thugs and bandits, too.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Leone, how many times have we been over this already? As for the dangers of the road, Woodrow's talked my ear off about them already. Yes, it's dangerous, we all know that.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: I'm just worried...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: I don't like making promises, you know.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: But I can promise you this: No matter what happens, I'll do everything to reach my destination. Even if I fall
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: You won't.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: You won't, Helena. Because I'll be right behind you. I'll take down every obstacle that slows you down.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: That's my promise to you.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: You just need to keep running straight ahead. Remember, keep going straight. Don't look back.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: I will, Leone... Goodbye...
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Now go. Hurry.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: He looks on as the dark, narrow tunnel engulfs Helena's silhouette. Finally, he can't help but turn around to take a look at the plant's generator in the center of the room.
There is barely anyone left on the plate, but the fire in the furnace burns as strong as ever.
The flames are reflected in his eyes. Dancing, stirring, leaping.
Yet even that is unable to melt the frigid ice lying in their depths.
Now... It's just you and me.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: You're late. The old Sankta's gone.
attributes.name: Helpless Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Where did he go...?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: The mine.
attributes.name: Twitchy Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: You're wounded...
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: It's fine. He held back... Ugh... I almost had him. Dammit.
attributes.name: Twitchy Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: ...One suggestion. If you girls run into him, try attacking his left shoulder.
attributes.name: Helpless Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: What
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I appreciate the advice. Now if you'll excuse us.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Faster... I have to hurry...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Leone sets the explosives on the wall and lifts his hand to wipe all the sweat that's gathered on his brow, but the heat immediately causes his skin to sweat even more.
Hurry...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: His lips start chapping. His saliva no longer serves to moisten his throat and mouth.
Faster...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: He sticks another one onto the wall, then another, and another...
The light of the intense fire sweeps into the bottom of his eyes, seemingly tearing his soul in two. One half supports his body's movements so that he can keep working.
While the other half has left his body entirely and stands firm in front of the furnace, staring into the raging fire.
As he attaches another stick of dynamite to the wall, he notices someone walking toward him from the light of the fire.
Come with me, Leone. We'll head to the frontier. That's where our new home is.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Miles... Don't go. Where are you going?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Another stick of dynamite is set on the wall. Miles turns toward the furnace, and a small shadow emerges.
I'm planning to leave Davistown. I don't want to stay here anymore. I'm leaving, Dad.
attributes.name: Benny

attributes.content: Benny...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Don't leave me... You're the only child I have left... Don't leave me like Carl did!
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Another stick of dynamite on the wall. The fire engulfs Benny, and twists into a tall, young man.
Good news, Dad. There's a mercenary company that thinks I'm pretty good. They say I'm a good fit for the gig... I'll be leaving in a few days.
attributes.name: Carl

attributes.content: No... Don't go. I won't let you.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: You'll die on the battlefield, Carl!
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Another stick of dynamite. The young man turns into a fireball and explodes in all directions.
No... Carl, come back!
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: The final stick of dynamite is set up on the wall.
A woman emerges from the fireball. He no longer remembers what she looked like, but he never once forgot her voice.
Mom...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Leone...
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: I have to go now. I'm sorry... I can't support you anymore...
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: Mom... Don't apologize. I'm doing well here.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Leone, sorry for leaving you all alone.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: No, Mom. I have a family here... Everyone here is my family.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Goodbye, Leone.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: Stay here, Mom...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Stay here... with me.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Leone, how are things going on your end?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: The explosives are all in the place... Once they're set off, the plant will explode in no time. Then, after the energy tower comes crashing down, no one will ever find that passage again.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: When are you leaving? I've lured the nearby mercenaries away, so I'm on my way there to pick you up.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: No... Don't come.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Have you already left?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: No, it's just... I don't want to go.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Jessica, tell this to Sylvia for me.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: No... I won't. If you have something to tell her, tell her yourself.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: She's... She's a clever girl, and still so young. A nice girl. If she finds a good man in the frontier, she should let herself fall in love again.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: I want her to be happy... God... why'd I have to treat her like that? If I'd known Carl was going to...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Carl...?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: No... Forget what I said. Tell her... Tell her I'm glad she still remembers and loves Carl...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: But he's gone... He's not here anymore...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: The living... deserve a choice...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: The living... shouldn't be bogged down by the dead...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: You deserve a choice, too. You need to live, and leave this place. You'll get to start fresh in the future.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Don't do anything stupid, I'm begging you! Think about Woodrow and Helena. They'll be heartbroken!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: And Benny! He just started school. He's got a bright future ahead of him. Don't you want to see what kind of man he'll become? Don't you want to see your son again?!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: And Miles... He's still waiting for you...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: But... she wants me to stay...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Who?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: She spread her arms, spread her heart, showed me that pretty face
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: And from that moment on, I found my dreams in her embrace
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Listen to me, Jessica. I can't leave this place. Because... Because that woman left me here on a rainy spring day.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: It was the perfect day for a seedling to take root and sprout. My... My roots have grown too deep. No one can pluck me out anymore.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Leone...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: It's gonna be a big bang. Cover your ears. Don't be afraid, and don't be sad.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: My life didn't begin the day I was born. It began the day I got here.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: In the same way, my death won't be on the day my life comes to an end. It'll be the day I leave this place.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Leone, please...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Don't worry, Jessica. I won't die. Because I'll be here forever...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: I'll live forever in her embrace...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: A loud explosion rings out high up above, and its massive shockwave shoves Jessica to the ground.
She tries her hardest to get up and move her legs, to run forward, but she finds herself unable to budge. Her body has never felt so heavy before.
She lifts her head up to look into the distance. A thick cloud of smoke is gushing out of a giant fissure in the tower's body.
The rubble mercilessly pummels the ground alongside a shower of sparks, turning the nearby buildings into wreckage beyond recognition.
No...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: A frigid wind blows toward her from afar, turning everything before her into nothing but a hazy blur, and leaving the corners of her eyes feeling awfully cold.
She reaches her fingers up toward the sky, as though she is trying to grasp something in the haze.
She blinks, and her vision starts to clear up. She sees a snowflake.
It's snowing.
Is that... the power plant? Hurry, Franka, drive faster!
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: You hear that, you stupid car?! Faster!
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Did... Did it work?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Jessica... What's the situation there?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Leone... respond...
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: ...I'm not getting a signal.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Dammit.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Helena stops in her tracks, and considers turning back to look.
The underground passage's structure, fragile to begin with, is unable to withstand the explosion on the surface. The fissures on the walls are rapidly spreading as far out as she can see.
Almost as if underlining the fact that she is walking a path of no return.
And so, in the end, she doesn't turn around. Instead, she keeps running.
She simply throws herself into the hidden tunnel, and towards the unknown up ahead.
...I really have gotten old.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Couldn't even dodge a little explosion like that...
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: That's... toward the energy tower.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Jessica...
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Woodrow...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: What's the situation at the energy tower? Has Helena entered the underground passage yet?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: What happened?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Leone... said he was staying... He said he didn't want to leave...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I didn't see him come out...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I waited... Maybe I missed him...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Does Helena know?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: I... I can't reach her...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Are you crying?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Am I? I think I am.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: *sigh*... It's all over now. You'll be fine. Let's see... You're from Blacksteel, and a Brynley. They won't touch you.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Where are you going, Woodrow? Can... Can I come look for you?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I still got some stuff to take care of... Can't go bringing you with me.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: ...Will I ever see you again?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Maybe, Jessica... Maybe.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Woodrow leans on the wall. He feels dazed and dizzy, and the burn wound on his shoulder aches.
He takes out the bullet from his pocket. He can barely make it out under the faint moonlight, so all he does is rub its engraving.
(In Lateran) Forgiveness... Damned right.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: May this bullet forgive what my heart cannot.
attributes.name: Woodrow
